name: Lisa
title: Rose Witch
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguised graduate in the past two centuries.

normalattack.name: Lightning Touch
normalattack.description: Perform up to four Electro DMG attacks. When charged, deals AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

elementalskill.name: Violet Arc
elementalskill.description: Releases a homing Lightning Orb that deals Electro DMG. If held, calls down lightning from heavens to inflict Electro DMG and Shocks enemies.

elementalburst.name: Lightning Rose
elementalburst.description: Continuously strikes enemies with Electro DMG for short amount of time.

passivetalent1.name: General Pharmaceutics
passivetalent1.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, there's a 20% chance portion of the crafting materials used will be refunded.

passivetalent2.name: Induced Aftershock
passivetalent2.description: When Lisa hits enemies with charged Attacks, they become Shocked.

passivetalent3.name: Static Electricity Field
passivetalent3.description: Enemies hit by Lightning Rose have DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.d1:
Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc. 
 A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.
constellations.d2:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects: 
1) Increases DEF by 25%.
2) Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
 Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby enemies. 
 This effect can only occur once every 5s.

profile.description:
The librarian of the Knights of Favonius. In addition to her elegance and charm, Lisa is also highly educated.
She is said to have been the most talented sorceress to study at the Sumeru Academia in the last two centuries. 
It is known that Lisa chose to return to Mondstadt after two years of advanced study in Sumeru, but the reason for the decision is not. 
Lisa currently serves as a librarian in the Knights of Favonius.
Lisa seems to be very flirtatious and charming, often referring to those around her as “cuties” as well as on rare occasions "honey".
